Text: when clicked to download it shows 1.10mb not 7.88gb... Sounds odd to me, be careful

Sorry, it's my fault. Because the folders of the book list folder have the same names as the main folders bitTorrent shows the main folders as located in the 00.Book List folder. You should double click on the 1.10 mb folder and all the 7.88 GB content should open up.
